data.name: CommandLineHelp_All
data.value: Indicates that all NuGet dependencies, including non-transitive dependencies, should be listed.
data.comment: The description of the "--all" parameter, which is displayed as part of the help message.

data.name: CommandLineHelp_ProjectOrSolution
data.value: The file name of the .NET project or solution to analyze.
data.comment: The description of the "--projectOrSolution" parameter, which is displayed as part of the help message.

data.name: CommandLineHelp_Filter
data.value: An optional dependency filter, to only show dependencies that start with the provided filter.
data.comment: The description of the "--filter" parameter, which is displayed as part of the help message.

data.name: Information_CommencingAnalysis
data.comment: The message displayed when analysis is about to commence.

data.name: Information_NoDependencies
data.comment: The message displayed when no NuGet dependencies are found.

data.name: Information_TransitiveDependency
data.comment: The message displayed for each transitive NuGet dependency. {0} will be replaced by the dependency identifier and version.
